Restaurant Finder is proud to offer unique program with special Benefits and Rewards to each customer for using great and special Restaurant Finder Mobile App. There is equal benefits of Loyalty Program for Restaurants and Customers. Creating a loyalty program for customers will have an immense impact on restaurant business:
 ● Restaurant give the reason to customers to hope to get something when user visits restaurant again. 
 ● Restaurant improve relationships with their customers. 
 ● Restaurant build their database of customers. 
 ● Restaurant have the possibility to gratitude and reward their loyal customers. 
 ● Restaurants are building a brand for their restaurant. 
 ● Restaurant become more competitive. 
 ● Frequency of their customers visits are increasing. 
 ● Restaurant can make more money. Loyalty Rewards ProgramLoyalty Rewards ProgramWhy do Restaurants Need a Loyalty Programs?

Restaurant Finder is proud to offer unique program with special Benefits and Rewards to each customer for using great and special Restaurant Finder Mobile App. There is equal benefits of Loyalty Program for Restaurants and Customers.

 Why do Restaurants Need a Loyalty Programs?
Creating a loyalty program for customers will have an immense impact on restaurant business:
 
 ● Restaurant give the reason to customers to hope to get something when visit restaurant again.
 ● Restaurant improve relationships with their customers.
 ● Restaurant build their database of customers.
 ● Restaurant have the possibility to gratitude and reward their loyal customers.
 ● Restaurants are building a brand for their restaurant.
 ● Restaurant become more competitive.
 ● Frequency of their customers visits is increasing.
 ● Restaurant can make more money.
 
 How do customers can join a Loyalty Reward Program?
It’s completely free, so why not?
 Sign up for the Table Grabber on Restaurant Finder.
 
 How do customers can earn a Loyalty Reward?
 Get rewarded for doing what you already love.
 ● Select Restaurant of your choice
 ● Grab table 
 ● Enjoy your meal 
 ● Give Review for restaurant 
 ● Get rewarded with X points on each table booking review 
 

Points can only be earn after giving restaurant reviews.
 
 How do customers can redeem a Loyalty Reward ?
Save or splurge?
 ● After earning loyalty rewards, get specific amount of discount
 ● Select restaurant of your choice
 ● Grab table and choose loyalty rewards
 ● Get discount on your bill 
 Points will be converted to amount. For example: X points = Y lei
 
 Consideration points
 
● The points associated with your bookings are available to you after giving the reviews for restaurant
 ● Reviews of restaurant will only be possible after order completion (Grab Table)
 ● Think beyond what you have: This means wait for more time and earn more points to get more discount
 ● Points received are limited to the bill amount of your order 
 ● Earn points whatever the device you use for your booking: mobile application on any device

Table Reservation must be less than Four character.

This Platform provides the possibility for the Restaurants to get more clients through online ordering option and through table grabbing option
 For these services, you will be charged, for each booking made through our platform, 3 lei/person.
 Regarding the online order functionality, you will be charged 10% from the total order.
 We will issue the bill at the end of each month for the previous month and we will send it to you through your e mail/ or by post if you will request that.
 After we issue the bill, you will have 15 days at your disposal to pay.
 If the payment is not made within this period, you will be charged 0.2% as interest calculated daily from the total amount of the bill.
 This represents a contract and by accepting it, you acknowledge what is written above and subscribe to it. All the differences will be solved by the jurisdictions within Romania
